gen:link.msg:message: {fmt:common(($sector, $paises, $a, $b))} if ({fmt:fact($sector, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))} = xs:QName('es_ebacrr_CT:x1185') {fmt:threshold(0)}) then (if ({fmt:fact($paises, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))} = (xs:QName('ebacrr_GA:x1'), xs:QName('ebacrr_GA:ES'), xs:QName('es_ebacrr_GA:x1110')) {fmt:threshold(0)}) then count({fmt:fact($a, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}[. > 0 {fmt:threshold(0)}]) > 0 {fmt:threshold(0)} and count({fmt:fact($a, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}[. > 0 {fmt:threshold(0)}]) <= 2 {fmt:threshold(0)} and count({fmt:fact($b, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}) = 7 {fmt:threshold(0)} else count({fmt:fact($a, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}[. >= 0 {fmt:threshold(0)}]) > 0 {fmt:threshold(0)} and count({fmt:fact($b, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}) = 7 {fmt:threshold(0)}) else (count({fmt:fact($a, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}) = 2 {fmt:threshold(0)} and count({fmt:fact($b, ($sector, $paises, $a, $b))}) = 7 {fmt:threshold(0)})
